column1: ‘it is the duty of a Judge to decide all questions of law arising in the course of the trial
and especially all questions as to the relevancy of facts which it is proposed to prove
and the admissibility of evidence or the propriety of questions asked by or on behalf

column2: in  his  discretion  to  prevent  the  production  of

column1: evidence whether it is or is not objected to by the parties.’
